pkgmetadata.longdescription: Consistent Co-Trending Rank Selection // Implements cointegration /co-trending rank selection algorithm in Guo and Shintani (2013) "Consistent co-trending rank selection when both stochastic and nonlinear deterministic trends are present". The Econometrics Journal 16: 473-483 doi:10.1111/j.1368-423X.2012.00392.x. Numbered examples correspond to Feb 2011 preprint http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/ecs/events/seminar/seminar- papers/05Apr11.pdf.
